actions.message: looks like the two player rules aren't implemented
using @ to notify you. Maybe an email?
Btw, o-ending SRR is not a good game move, just testing
I see why the 30% president share is needed for 2. Need the extra space for paper limit.
finally read the 2 player rules entirely.  It's a radical change.
When a company floats the rest of the shares move immediately to the open market and parking value no longer applies
and when you buy from the open market you have to burn one of that companies shares from the pool if you aren't the president
